You began remembering back to when it must of happened.

FLASHBACK******************************************************************* ******************************************************************************** *********************

You were laying on the couch, just watching tv, when Julie arrived home.

"What's up twerp?" She said as she plopped down on the couch next to you. She proceeded to lay down in the opposite direction of you, with her booted feet laying right next to your head. They were her favorite pair of ugg boots that she wore everywhere.

"Get your feet out of my face!" You yelled as you pushed her boots away.

"What's wrong, you don't think my boots are cute?" She said as she fought to keep them where they were. You kept struggling to push them away. After a bit of this struggle, you accidentally pushed one of the boots off of her foot. The second this happened, she placed her foot right over your nose.

"Gross! Julie get your fucking foot out of my face"

"Haha, it's your fault, you must like my stinky feet since you took my boot off."

She proceeded to remove her other boot while you pushed her foot out of your face. Now she rested her socked feet right next to your face. They were disgusting black socks, clearly soaked with sweat. The horrid odor wafted into your nostrils, but you decided not to deal with anymore of her shit, so you just moved your head a little bit further and turned your head.

Julie inched her feet closer to your head without you noticing, but you did notice the presence of the odor a bit more.

After 10 minutes of being forced into such close proximity of her feet, you glanced over at her feet. Julie was wiggling her toes in her sweaty socks quite a bit. You felt like throwing up, thinking about how smelly it must be in there. You nearly wretched as you imagined a person being stuck in there at any point in time.

"Gross, my socks are so sweaty, I should take them off" Julie suddenly mentioned. She pulled her feet back and peeled off both her socks. You couldn't help but watch in horror as she peeled the socks off, revealing her hot, sweaty feet. There was a sheen of sweat on them that slightly reflected light. There was also thin layers of dirt around the parts where there is the most pressure on the foot while a person walks. She wiggled them to show their new found freedom, and you could of sworn you saw clumps of toe jam in between her toes.

As disgusted as you were, you turned your head trying to ignore them, and closed your eyes to try and go to sleep. A few seconds later, you smelled the second most disgusting thing you've ever smelled, and felt something land on your chest. She had crossed her bare feet on top of your chest.

"Hey bro, wanna give me a foot massage?" Julie said as her toes wiggled in anticipation, releasing waves of foot odor directly at your face, as if they were homing in on your nose.

"Fuck off Julie" You said as you once again tried to ignore her. You certainly did not want to touch her feet, so you tried to go to sleep again.

Somehow, even with the odor in the air, you managed to sleep.

You had a horrific dream however, that you were tiny and Julie was dangling you over the opening of her sweaty black sock. You yelled for her to let you go, but instead she just dropped you inside, and you were overcome with hot sticky foot air. The humidity and scent were indescribable. When you hit the toe section you were jolted awake.

Unfortunately, you were jolted awake to sweaty feet directly on your face. When you fell asleep, Julie had began wiping her feet all over your face, and you woke up to her toes forming a cage over your nose.

"What the fuck is wrong with you!" You yelled as you tried to knock her feet from your face, only to just now realize that your hands were being held down by something.

Just then you heard your younger sister stacy laughing. She was keeping your hands behind your head, locked up in a strong hold. Julie continued sliding her feet in your face.

"You're not getting out of her that easy" Julie said laughing, "Smell my stinky feet little bro". After 30 seconds of this torture, you were on the verge of tears. Just then your sister Sarah came by.

"Hey Julie, can I borrow your boots?"

"Sure Sarah, go ahead" Julie replied.

You yelled for help from Sarah. She looked you in the eye and smirked. Before she put on Julie's boots, she began to peel off her sweaty white socks, and she grabbed them by the opening.

"Hey Julie, move your feet real quick" Julie moved her feet temporarily, which let you finally yell out.

"HELP!!!"

Instantly, Sarah shoved her sweaty socks toe end first into your mouth and pressed your jaw closed. Julie then immediately replaced her feet.

Sarah walked away smiling, "Sucks to be you" she said.

Sarah's socks, were the most disgusting thing you'd ever tasted. Luckily you didn't have to smell them up close, because Sarah's feet are the 1. most horrid thing you've smelled in your life.

After almost a minute of continuous foot torture, all the rage built up inside you exploded, and you broke Stacy's grip. You threw Julies feet off of your face, and got up immediately. Julie was laughing hysterically.

"FUCK YOU. I HOPE YOU DIE!" You yelled.

Julie laughed and replied, "Oh, I'm not the one who's going to die. But your going to be wishing you were dead soon enough" Julie slyly replied as she held up her feet and wiggled her toes in your direction. She also mentioned something else, "And when you die, trust me, it's not heaven your going to be going to" She said as she threw her socks at you and continued wiggling her toes at you.

Something about that was off, and it kind of scared you, but you just went to go wash your face as it was soaked in foot sweat. Strangely enough, by the time you got to the bathroom, your face was dry. It didn't feel like the foot sweat evaporated though...more like it got sucked into your face...You washed your face anyway with soap and water, but even afterwards t smelled clearly of Julie's foot odor. You just wanted to get some sleep, so you went to your room and did exactly that.

The car stops and Bianca and Cassandra get out. Bianca stomps her right foot a few times, making sure you are in position then runs out to the field. As you find yourself in the confines of her dark shoe, your other senses heighten and the feel of her feet, while soft, becoming increasingly present. The smell also becomes stronger and the taste of her sweat more salty. Right now she is only doing warm-ups, but you are sure you have a long game ahead of you. As the match starts, Bianca runs up and down the field, they don’t really have positions, so girls are running everywhere, but today Bianca seems to be faster than the other girls. Early on she gets a breakaway and scores. She jumps up and down on top of you stomping her further into her foot in celebration. As the game progresses Bianca scores two more goals and gets a hat trick. The game did not go as nice for you, however. You had to deal with the constant stomps of your cousin and her sweat, which drenched your body. You found that she inherited her sweat glands from her mother, as you were completely soaked during her runs too. However, you were starting to like Cassandra’s feet, whereas Bianca’s did not fill you with lust. None of this mattered to Bianca’s foot, which ran all over you for ninety minutes until the final whistle sounded. Her team ended up winning four to one. “Bianca, whatever you did today, keep it up,” the coach said. Both Cassandra and Bianca knew what it was and going back to Trisha was starting to look better and better to you.
As Bianca and Cassandra left the field they got into the car. Bianca took her shoes off to air out her feet, which were covered in sweat soaked socks.
“AH, THAT FEELS BETTER,” Bianca said, wiggling her toes on each foot.
“WOW JAKEY, WITH YOU AS MY INSOLE I SCORED THREE GOALS,” Bianca boomed down with a smile on her face.
“…AND AS A REWARD MOMMY IS TAKING ME TO MCDONALDS! SHE SAYS YOU CAN’T HAVE ANY THOUGH, BECAUSE INSOLES DON’T EAT FOOD, SORRY!” Bianca continues.
You did wonder why you weren’t hungry this entire time, it must have been something about shrinking that kept you from getting hungry. Cassandra then says to Bianca,
“SWEETIE, YOUR FEET STINK, PUT YOUR SHOES BACK ON UNTIL WE GET HOME, THEN TAKE A SHOWER.”
After getting McDonald’s they arrived home and Bianca took her shoes and socks off.
“I NEED TO SEE JAKE WHILE YOU SHOWER,” Cassandra said to Bianca.
Bianca then peeled you off her sole and put you in Cassandra’s hands and walked off.
“HOPE TO SEE YOU SOON LITTLE INSOLE,” Bianca said as she walked away.
“WOW, YOU SMELL TERRIBLE JAKE, IT’S ALMOST AS IF A LITTLE GIRL PUT YOU UNDER HER STINKY FOOT AND PLAYED A SOCCER MATCH WITH YOU,” Cassandra said smiling as she held you near her face.
“I HOPE YOU ARE LEARNING A LESSON. MY FEET ARE NOT A PLAYGROUND TO PLEASE YOURSELF WITH. THEY ARE A PART OF MY BEAUTY BODY TO BE PAMPERED IN THE WAY I SEE FIT. NOW, I’M GOING TO LET BIANCA HAVE YOU AGAIN AFTER HER SHOWER. I MIGHT BE BACK TO COLLECT YOU IN THE MORNING BEFORE SHE GOES TO SCHOOL… IF YOU ARE LUCKY.”

Were you lucky?:
122111121112112112121121121.title: Your night with Cassandra's feet go bad...

choices: I'm going to need Jake back
You get to keep Jake forever!
1221111211121121121211211211.content:
Bianca finished showering and Cassandra said,
“HERE’S JAKE BACK, HAVE FUN!”
Bianca puts you on the ground and stomps you into her sole and walks to her room.
“OK JAKEY,” Bianca says as she gets to her room and sits on her bed, “YOU’RE GOING TO HELP ME PUT LOTION ON MY FEET.”
“Since when do you put lotion on your feet?” you ask.
“SINCE I GOT A FOOT SLAVE TO DO IT FOR ME,” She replies.
She then turned over on her stomach and grabbed a bottle of lotion.
“It’s too big for me to operate,” you tell her.
“THAT’S WHY I’M GOING TO PUT SOME ON YOU, THEN YOU WILL RUB YOURSELF, AND THE LOTION INTO MY SOLES. IT’S A GOOD THING INSOLES DON’T DO THE THINKING AROUND HERE, WE’D BE IN BIG TROUBLE,” she says mocking you.
She puts you under the bottle and uses the pump to put a large glob of lotion on you, then places you at her feet.
“NOW RUB YOUR BODY INTO MY FEET JAKEY,” Bianca ordered down to you. You did as you were told and rubbed yourself up and down her sole and all around her toes. You were glad her feet were smaller than Cassandra’s or this would have taken much longer. She grabs you as you finish her left foot and reapplies lotion to you and puts you at her right foot. You, again, rub yourself all over her foot getting every nook and cranny. As you reach her toes, she scrunches you powerfully and says,
“I LOVE HAVING YOU AS A FOOTSLAVE JAKEY, YOU’RE SO WELL TRAINED AND DO SUCH A GOOD JOB.”
Bianca grabbed a tissue and cleaned the remaining lotion off your body, which you had to admit did make her feet smell really good, like lavender.
“NOW THAT WE HAVE THAT DONE, I WANT TO PLAY A GAME. IT’S CALLED FIND YOUR WAY UNDER MY FOOT,” Bianca said as she gave you a tiny blindfold.
“I WILL PUT YOU SOMEWHERE IN MY BEDROOM AND THEN I WILL STAND IN ANOTHER PLACE WITH MY HEEL LIFTED OFF THE GROUND AND YOUR JOB IS TO FIND YOUR WAY UNDER MY HEEL SO I CAN STOMP YOU!” Bianca said giggling.
You didn’t want to play the game, but you put on the blindfold she gave you.
“PUT ON THE BLINDFOLD AND I WILL PUT YOU SOMEWHERE AND THEN STAND WITH MY HEEL IN THE AIR SO YOU CAN FIND YOUR WAY TO YOUR RIGHTFUL PLACE… UNDER MY FOOT!” Bianca said.
You put the blindfold on and she walked all around the room then dropped you. You heard footsteps, which then stopped. You guessed she was ready and tried to use your sense of smell to find your way back to her. She helped by saying hotter and colder and you were able to follow her voice. You could tell you were close then she said, “ON FIRE,” and you felt her heel come down on your body. You were re-introduced with the smell of the lotion as her heel twisted on top of you. You licked her foot and when she lifted her heel, you were stuck to it.
“HEHE, I LOVE MAKING YOU STICK TO MY FOOT JAKEY, BUT I’M GOING TO PULL YOU OFF SO WE CAN PLAY AGAIN,” Bianca says as she uses her left big toenail to scrape you off her foot, just like she saw her mother do. You play “Find your way under Bianca’s sole” four more times before Cassandra tells Bianca it’s bedtime.
Bianca then gets into bed and puts you under the covers at her feet and says,
“JAKEY, RUB MY FEET WHILE I SLEEP, IT’S BEEN A LONG DAY…”
You do as you are told and start at her heel and rub up her soft soles, which still smell like the lotion she used earlier. With you rubbing her feet, Bianca falls asleep quickly.
Morning comes and you find yourself in Bianca’s hand as she is lowering you to the ground,
“MOMMY SAYS I CAN KEEP YOU FOR SCHOOL TODAY,” she says.
“I THINK I’LL WEAR YOU IN MY FLATS, SO NO ONE KNOWS I’VE GOT YOU AS MY INSOLE,” Bianca says walking to her closet and putting her flats on the ground beside you. “NOW HOP IN MY LEFT ONE AND LAY WHERE THE BALL OF MY HAS LEFT AN INDENTATION,” she commands. You run up to her shoe as she gets dressed and lay in the indentation of the ball of her left foot. As you lay there, waiting for the inevitable, you hope that Cassandra will walk in and take you back. Of course, this doesn’t happen and you see Bianca come back in a t-shirt and shorts as she lifts her foot and put it in her shoe. You see her five large toes come right at you as her big and second toe caress your face, making their way to the deepest part of the shoe, then the ball of her foot comes down on you and blocks out all your light, at which point you start licking.
“YOU’RE GOING TO BE UNDER MY FOOT THE WHOLE DAY JAKEY. AREN’T I NICE TO LET YOU STAY UNDER MY FOOT WHILE I GO ABOUT MY DAY? KISS MY SOLE A COUPLE TIMES IF YOU AGREE,” Bianca said down to you. You stopped licking and kissed her sole in agreement, not wanting to anger her in any way. Bianca feels you and says wiggling her toes in excitement,
“I’M SO GLAD YOU AGREE. HOPEFULLY MOMMY WILL LET ME KEEP YOU UNDER MY FEET FOREVER, RIGHT WHERE YOU BELONG. WELL, ENJOY THE BOTTOM OF MY FOOT.”
Bianca then grabs a pack of pop-tarts and walks to the bus stop. During the ride to school you notice her feet are smelling less and less like lotion and more like they did yesterday during her soccer game.
As you get to school you spend the first few periods under her foot licking her sole as she would occasionally flex her foot or wiggle her toes. As she started her fourth period class she took her shoes off, of course you were stuck to the ball of her foot after all the stomps she had placed on you. You heard her say, “EWW, I SHOULD HAVE WASHED THESE SOCKS, THEY STINK,” and you realize she is in gym class. She then puts on her socks, which smell terrible, as she’s worn them all last week without taking them home to wash them. She quickly puts her feet in her shoes before anyone can smell them and you are plunged into the smelly dungeon that is her tennis shoe. You weren’t sure what game the class was playing, but it really didn’t matter to you, it seemed to involve a lot of running and being stomped and sweated on, so you didn’t particularly like it. As with soccer the day before, Bianca dominated the game, and you heard “good job Bianca, you might be the fastest and most athletic person in the class and that includes the boys…” from the gym teacher. Her feet were beginning to match that of a star athlete’s after a game, sweaty and stinky, as she went back to her locker, took off her socks and put you back into her flats. Her feet now lost any scent of the lotion that had been placed on them by you yesterday and were replaced by a powerful odor.
You continued your day under her shoe, and as class after class went by you wondered if this school day would last forever. The final bell sounded and Bianca went to the bus and rode home. As she entered the house she took off her flats and said, “WOW, THAT WAS THE BEST DAY OF SCHOOL EVER! I HOPE I GET TO KEEP YOU, BECAUSE THERE WILL BE MANY MORE DAYS LIKE THAT IN OUR FUTURE.” You definitely hoped there wouldn’t be more days like today in your future, being an insole for Bianca’s feet was very unpleasant…
Realizing she had a few hours before her mother got home, Bianca went into Cassandra’s room and found the tools and nail polish you used to paint her nails last week.
“NOW JAKEY, BEFORE MOMMY GETS HOME, YOU’RE GOING TO PAINT MY NAILS,” Bianca said as she put the green polish, which matched her soccer team’s color, in front of you.
You painted each of her ten toenails, which took less time than Cassandra’s since they were smaller. As you finished she put you under her big toe and you licked it as she waited for her toenails to dry. Once dry she told you to paint the letters of her name, starting on her left foot’s middle toe and working your way right, and to do it so she could read it. This took you longer than the initial coat, especially since Bianca was fidgety. After you finished, Bianca put the tools back in her mother’s room and put you on the bed at her feet. She looked down at her feet and she could read her name “BIANCA” written across her toes when she put her feet together.
“AS A REWARD FOR DOING SUCH A GOOD JOB ON MY TOENAILS, I’LL LET YOU RUB MY FEET JAKEY,” Bianca says wiggling her stinky feet in your face. You wonder how rubbing stinky feet is a reward, but do as she says and put your body into it. After an hour you hear the door open and realize Cassandra is home. She walks in and sees you giving Bianca a foot rub and says,
“HOW IS JAKE WORKING OUT?”
“OH, HE’S GREAT MOMMY, THE PERFECT INSOLE AND SLAVE FOR MY FEET,” Bianca says wiggling her toes. Cassandra leaves you and Bianca and makes dinner. Bianca puts you on the ground and gives you a stomp, sticking you to her right heel and walks to the dinner table. As she eats her meal you lick her heel. After dinner, Cassandra says to Bianca,
“___________”

What does she say?:
1221111211121121121211211211.title: Of course not

choices: Cassandra leaves you with Claire for the day
12211112111211211212112112111.content:
“BIANCA, I’M GOING TO NEED JAKE BACK,” Cassandra said after dinner.
“BUT MOMMY, HE FEELS SO NICE UNDER MY FEET!” Bianca says.
“I KNOW, BUT IF YOU’RE GOOD, YOU MIGHT GET TO HAVE HIM UNDER YOUR FOOT FOR YOUR NEXT SOCCER MATCH,” Cassandra says smiling.
Bianca takes her big toe on her left foot and peels you off. She lowers her toe foot down on you and says, “GIVE MY TOE ONE LAST KISS GOODBYE JAKEY!”
You do as instructed and she says “I HOPE TO HAVE YOU BACK UNDER MY FOOT SOON! BYE!”
She then goes to her room to play, saddened you are no longer her foot slave.
Cassandra looks down at you. You feel as though she is staring through your soul and you become scared. “I’M STILL VERY UPSET WITH YOU. YOU THOUGHT YOU COULD TAKE ADVANTAGE OF ME. LET ME TELL YOU SOMETHING YOU LITTLE FOOTDIRT, INSOLES DON’T USE THEIR MASTER’S FEET, THEY GET USED BY THEIR MASTER’S FEET,” Cassandra said down to you scornfully.
You nodded and she lifted her foot and stomped you into the ground under the ball of her left foot.
“…AND WHAT’S WORSE IS THAT I HAD TO PUNISH YOU BY PUTTING YOU UNDER BIANCA’S FEET, DEPRIVING MY FEET OF THEIR INSOLE TODAY,” She said as she turned her foot sideways looking down at you.
You were stuck to her foot as she walked to her bedroom and got her slippers. Even though you still smelled like Bianca’s soles, you were glad to be back under Cassandra’s. It took a few hours, but slowly the smell from Cassandra’s feet replaced Bianca’s. You were too scared to get aroused, since the last time you were, you ended up under Bianca’s feet for almost two days. You realized today was Monday and that you’d have a choice to make by Friday afternoon. Being back under Cassandra’s feet made you want to stay with her, but after the last two days, you wondered what your life would be like if you did.
Cassandra said nothing to you for the rest of the night, until bed, as you laid in her slippers lapping at the ball of her foot. She would move her foot or flex her toes, but no attention was paid to you. You started to mix in a few kisses as you were still licking away at her sole. She wiggled her toes, but said nothing. You were happy just to have that level of recognition after staying under her sole for several hours with none prior. Cassandra went to bed and peeled you off her sole with her big toe from her right foot. She only said, “RUB!” down to you as she put her head on the pillow and fell asleep. You did as you were told and rubbed her foot, putting in as much effort as possible. Even though she was already asleep you spent hours rubbing her feet and trying to get away any loose pieces of dirt in order to please her and hoped she would notice when she awoke. You eventually fell asleep and as you woke up you realized you were in her shoe. As you looked up, you saw her right heel settle down on top of you. As her sweat soaked into your pores, any remnant of the smell of Bianca’s feet was replaced by that of Cassandra’s. Being under Bianca’s foot the past two days, you forgot how powerful the footfalls of Cassandra were, and since you were cushioning her heel, they were the most powerful. You also realized that since you’ve been shrunk, you’ve inhaled more breathes that smelled like feet, whether it be Cassandra, Bianca, or Claire’s than you have of fresh air. It was to the point now that you weren’t grossed out by the smell anymore, unless they were really bad, but instead you started to pick up each woman’s foot scent. Having been under all three pairs of feet in the house you figured you could probably be blindfold and guess whose foot was on top of you just from the smell…
Cassandra finished her run and took off her shoes as she entered the house. The normal routine ensued and you found yourself glad to be walked on on a carpeted floor, since her shoes had no insole left. She poured her bubble bath and you were placed in the bathtub as she stepped in. Without saying a word she peeled you off her heel with her fingers, dipped your body in the water and rubbed you up and down her left foot, then dipped you back in and used you to floss between her toes and under them. She then did this for her right foot, and after she finished she lifted her toes and then flexed them, squeezing you beneath them. Cassandra relaxed for a few moments, then got out of the tub, leaving you underneath her toes and stepped on the bathmat. She rolled you under her foot, then quickly lifted her right foot and stomped you, twisting you back and forth under the ball of her foot as she dried off with her towel. You stayed under her foot as she got ready and put on her clothes. She then put on a pair of pantyhose and slipped you into her high heels and left the house. The drive to work was the same as always, with you under her right foot you’d cushion her stomps as she operated the pedals, instead of those days where you were under left foot and got a break, if you could call being stuck to a woman’s sole inside her pantyhose a break.
She arrived to work and kept her feet, and subsequently you, inside her shoes almost all day. This caused her feet to sweat more than they normally did while she was at work, but having you licking at her sole, she didn’t notice too much of a difference. She paid no attention to you at work and didn’t even acknowledge your existence. The same continued on the drive home. As she walked in the door Claire came by and said, “CAN I USE THE FAMILY INSOLE NOW?”
“SURE, JUST LET ME TAKE MY PANTYHOSE OFF, I’LL BE RIGHT BACK,” Cassandra said as she walked into her bedroom. You stayed stuck under her sole as she removed her pantyhose and she walked back to Claire and said, “HERE HE IS,” as she peeled you off her sole with her fingernails.
“I’LL NEED HIM BACK TOMORROW MORNING FOR MY RUN,” Cassandra said. She then handed you to Claire who dropped you on the floor and stomped you with her left foot, adhering you to the ball of her sole.
“I’D LIKE TO HAVE THE INSOLE PAINT MY NAILS, CAN I BORROW THOSE TINY TOOLS YOU HAVE?” Claire says to Cassandra as she wiggles her toes.
“OK, BUT YOU MIGHT WANT TO WAIT TIL AFTER DINNER FOR HIM TO START, SINCE IT TAKES HIM SOME TIME AND I’M GETTING DINNER STARTED,” Cassandra said.
Cassandra retrieved the tools as Claire went to her room and took a short nap.
As Claire stepped on you, you were re-introduced with the smell of her feet. After the day you had with Cassandra, you might as well be under Claire’s feet, since Cassandra was treating you exactly like Claire, just an insignificant piece of dirt who deserved to be under her foot. You thought about how Bianca at least seemed to get excited about you being under her sole and told you were a good insole/footslave.
Claire slept until dinner, then you spent the meal under her foot. Bianca wondered where you were and asked “CAN I HAVE JAKEY UNDER MY FOOT SOON MOMMY?”
“WE’LL SEE HONEY,” Cassandra replied. You wished she would have said yes, so you could escape having to serve Claire.
Dinner ended and Claire walked back to her room and set nail polish and her tools at her feet and peeled you off with her right big toenail. Claire looked down at you with her arms crossed and boomed,
“OK INSOLE, YOU’RE GOING TO PAINT MY TOENAILS, WHILE I DO MY FINGERNAILS. HERE’S WHAT I WANT. YOU WILL PUT ON A COAT OF BLACK PAINT, THEN DRAW A DIAGONAL LINE GOING THE SAME WAY ALONG EACH OF THE NAILS ON MY RIGHT FOOT, AND GOING THE OTHER WAY ON EACH OF MY NAILS ON THE LEFT FOOT, YOU WILL THEN PAINT ONE SIDE RED, LEAVING THE OTHER BLACK. FINALLY, YOU WILL DRAW A THIN WHITE LINE ALONG THE DIAGONAL BETWEEN THE TWO.”
You nodded and got to work. Putting on the black paint took little time since you were used to painting women’s toenails by now, which only took about fifteen minutes and you waited for it to dry. The red portion took about thirty and you had to wait for that to dry, then the line only took ten minutes. You were proud of yourself that you took such a short amount of time, but Claire merely looked down at her toes and noticed you were done then lifted her right foot and stomped you to the ball of her sole. She then enjoyed a night of television with her sister and niece before turning in. As she put you under the covers at her feet she said the same one word as her sister had the night before, “RUB!” and you were met with darkness as you massaged the soft, smelly soles of your Aunt Claire.

What happens in the morning?:
12211112111211211212112112111.title: I'm going to need Jake back

122111121112112112121121121111.content:
You rubbed Claire’s feet for several hours before falling asleep at her soles. You woke up to a familiar image of Cassandra grabbing you and taking you to her room for her daily run. She normally picked you up with her hands and carried you to her room after your nights with Claire, as she wanted to put you in her shoe in a comfortable spot, then use her foot to stomp you. Instead of sticking you to her foot first, then hoping you were comfortable under her sole. As she grabbed you, your head stuck out above her index finger and thumb as she walked to her room. You used the opportunity to try to get her attention.
“Cassandra! Aunt Cassandra! I’m really sorry, it won’t happen again. Can we please go back to the way it was?” you pleaded.
She continued walking, then stopped in her bedroom and looked right at you.
“OK, FINE, BUT SINCE I HAD TO PUNISH YOU FOR TWO DAYS, I WANT THOSE DAYS BACK, SO YOU WILL DECIDE ON SUNDAY WHETHER TO STAY OR GO,” Cassandra told you. You nodded in agreement.
“ALSO, YOU’LL GO BACK UNDER BIANCA’S FEET FOR HER GAME ON SUNDAY. I CAN’T DEPRIVE MY GIRL OF BEING A SUPERSTAR,” Cassandra said smiling.
You looked away and she snapped back saying,
“WHAT’S WRONG WITH MY DAUGHTER’S FEET?”
“It’s just that she does not wash them as much as you do Aunt Cassandra, also, she is a little young for me,” you reply, trying not to anger her.
“WELL, THEN THAT’S ANOTHER THING, I WANT YOU TO PROMISE ME YOU WILL MAKE MORE OF AN EFFORT TO LIKE HER FEET AS MUCH AS YOU DO MINE,” Cassandra commanded.
You nodded again in agreement and Cassandra placed you in her shoe wiggling her toes as her left foot came down on top of you, “I’M SO GLAD YOU’VE LEARNED YOUR LESSON AND AGREED TO LET ME KEEP YOU TWO MORE DAYS BEFORE DECIDING,” Cassandra commented before stomping you to the ball of he left foot, tying her shoes and running out the door for her ten mile jog.
Cassandra was in a good mood and so were you, happy that she would start treating you like she originally did, which might mean rewards… As she stomped and sweated on you during her run you wondered if accepting rewards was a good idea as you would not want to leave once she offered it, which you figured was part of her plan. You thought maybe you could be at her feet some when you were big and she could still give you rewards. As you were lost in your thoughts, you noticed that the run was already over. You realized that with you cushioning her sole all these days she was getting quicker. You wonder if you are some kind of sports enhancer or something since you seem to bring such good luck to whoever’s foot you are under when they compete in any athletic competition.
As Cassandra walked in the door from her run, the normal routine ensued and you found yourself stuck under her sole as she rested her feet on the edge of the tub. She peeled you off and said,
“WHY DON’T YOU USE THE TOOLS TODAY TO CLEAN MY FEET, SINCE THEY NEVER SEEM TO GET AS CLEAN AS WHEN I USE YOUR BODY…”
You ran to the tools and dipped the stick with the cloth on it into the water and started washing her soles, like you had done days before. As before, she giggled and told you to press harder, so you didn’t tickle her feet. You were able to clean slightly over half her foot, before you had to ask her to lower her feet so you could finish your task. Remembering last time, you decided to ask nice the first time. “Cassandra, it seems specks of dirt and sweat have tried to stick themselves to your beautiful feet, as your lowly servant, I ask you to please lower your feet down, so I may clean them off, since I am so insignificant I cannot clean your feet without your help,” you ask on bended knee. Cassandra smiles and says “I’M GLAD YOU ARE LEARNING. NOW KISS MY TOE AND I’LL DO AS YOU REQUESTED MY SLAVE.” Cassandra then lowers her pinky toe on her left foot down to your face. You inhale, smelling her scent, and plant a kiss on her toe. Cassandra lets out a giggle then lowers her feet down to a level at which you can finish cleaning them. As you are finishing you get an idea. “Aunt Cassandra!,” you shout.
“YES SLAVE,” Cassandra replies.
“I had an idea for an activity we could do at work today,” you continue.
“YEA…” Cassandra replies disinterested.
“Well, Bianca let me put lotion on her soles, and I was thinking we might try the same thing…” you say sheepishly.
“OH, SO MY FEET NEED LOTION?” Cassandra asks sounding annoyed.
“No, but I was ju…” You reply before getting cut off.
“THEN WHY WOULD I NEED YOU TO PUT LOTION ON THEM?” Cassandra asked.
“I didn’t mean any disrespect Aunt Cassandra, it’s just that Bianca had me put lotion on her soles, and she seemed to like it, I thought maybe you would too,” you said, hoping not to be punished.
“THAT DOES SOUND LIKE FUN. WE MIGHT HAVE TO DO THAT SOMETIME,” Cassandra said as she snatched you with her toes and exited the tub. You were hopeful she would try out your idea, as the thought of you rubbing yourself into Cassandra’s soles excited you. You were so consumed by your thoughts you failed to notice you were already under her left foot again inside her pantyhose. Cassandra did something different and placed you under her heel, as she slid her pantyhose on and put on her work shoes.
The drive to work was routine, but Cassandra seemed to enjoy bobbing her left heel, with you underneath, up and down to the music, giving you light stomps on her drive to work. At work, Cassandra took off her shoes and pantyhose, then peeled you off and put you on the floor at her feet, before re-inserting her leg into the hose. Cassandra looked down at you and said,
“TODAY SLAVE, YOU WILL SHINE MY SHOES AND CLEAN THE INSOLES. DO A GOOD JOB AND SOMEONE MIGHT BE PUTTING LOTION ON MY FEET TONIGHT.”
You found tiny tools, some rags and shoe shiner, beside you and you got to work. It took about an hour, but you managed to finish cleaning both shoes, as Cassandra talked on the phone and typed high above. You jumped in her right high heel and found very little dirt to clean, so you scrubbed her insole. As you tried to get out, you found yourself too small to jump out and called for Cassandra, who merely let out a giggle and tipped the shoe over. You made your way to her other shoe and jumped in, and cleaned out the dirt as well as possible. Cassandra then tipped over the shoe causing you to fall out. She saw you were finished and pulled down her pantyhose, inserted you, then re-inserted her right foot into the hosiery. She used her fingers to position you horizontally under her toes. You had been in this position many times already and knew she planned to use you as a scrunch toy for her feet for the rest of the day. As you licked Cassandra’s second toe she flexed her toes around you. It felt like a soft, yet very powerful, hug from all directions. You took a deep breath and her feet still smelled clean, but there was a hint of her odor starting to come through. You knew this would be the smelliest and sweatiest part of her foot, but didn’t mind, you had already become accustomed to her feet. As she lowered her foot back into her shoe you heard her say “HAVE A NICE DAY!” You wondered if she was talking to a customer over the phone or you. You spent the rest of the day in her shoe licking her toe. She would often wiggle her toes or scrunch them around you as the day went on. As the day ended she drove home, you under her toes still licking at them. Cassandra walked in the front door and removed her heels and pantyhose as she decided whose foot you should be under tonight.

Who’s getting you tonight?:
122111121112112112121121121111.title: Cassandra takes you back

choices: Not tomorrow, but maybe if you are good you can have him later
Why sure, I bet he'd love to go back under your feet
1221111211121121121211211211111.content:
Just then Bianca walked in wearing her soccer uniform and said,
“WE BETTER GO SOON OR WE’RE GOING TO BE LATE TO PRACTICE MOMMY.”
“OH, I ALMOST FORGOT, HERE, TAKE JAKE, HE SHOULD HELP YOU PLAY BETTER,” Cassandra said back, as she handed you to Bianca.
“THANKS MOMMY, I’LL PUT HIM UNDER MY FOOT IMMEDIATELY,” Bianca said happily as she went into the living room and removed her left knee high sock.
“I WAS HOPING I’D GET YOU BACK UNDER MY FOOT JAKEY, SO I DIDN’T WASH MY FEET SINCE THE LAST TIME YOU WERE UNDER THEM, CAN YOU TELL?” Bianca booms down. She then rubs you up and down her left sole and says,
“TAKE DEEP BREATHES; I WANT YOU TO BECOME ACCUSTOMED TO MY FEET.”
You did as instructed and almost gagged. At least when Cassandra’s feet stank it was only because of exercise, Bianca’s feet hadn’t been washed in couple days and you were being pressed right into her sole, as she was making sure you smelled every nook and cranny.
After a few minutes she stopped and said,
“WE’LL HAVE MORE FUN AFTER PRACTICE JAKEY, BUT NOW IT’S TIME TO GO.”
She threw you in her sock and placed it back on her foot, then positioned you under the ball of her foot, so you would cushion her footsteps.
“ARE WE ALL READY?” Cassandra asks.
“YEP, JAKEY IS UNDER MY LEFT FOOT BEING A GOOD INSOLE LIKE ALWAYS, THANKS FOR LETTING ME USE HIM AGAIN MOMMY,” Bianca says.
“WELL, WE CAN’T HAVE OUR STAR ATHLETE WITHOUT HER SPECIAL INSOLE CAN WE?” Cassandra replied as both let out a laugh and Bianca wiggled her toes.
You heard the entire conversation as they walked to the door and put their shoes on. Every time you were under Bianca’s foot you wanted to put up a fight, but realized it was useless. As a high schooler, you were used to being bossed around by adults, them telling you what to do and what not to do. So, Cassandra and Claire using you as a footslave and insole, while not necessarily pleasant, was not completely awful. However, Bianca was a few years younger than you, so if anything, you should be bossing her around and telling her what to do, not serving as an insole during her soccer practices and games. That’s where you found yourself again though, under her sole on the way to a soccer practice and completely unable to do anything about the situation, except lick the bottom of her foot, as you were currently doing. At your current size she could do anything she wanted to you, you tried to think about the fact she could put you in a few places worse than you were now and be thankful you were so good at pleasing her feet, but it didn’t ease your mind much.
You felt the car stop and Bianca hopped out, stomping your underfoot. She thanked her mother for the ride and made her way to practice. The practice started out with a lot of running warm-ups and her feet became sweatier and smellier than they were in the car. Her socks became drenched with sweat, along with her feet, as your tongue could not keep up with the amount of sweat the girl’s feet were producing. As the half hour warm-up sprints ended her footfalls slowed, then she stopped and was standing still on top of you as she drank some water. “Great job Bianca,” you heard her coach say from outside the shoe. You hoped that her practice was over, but then you heard “Ok, time for our scrimmage.” Any hope of leaving her sole soon was shattered as she ran to the field again. She stood still for a few seconds, then you heard a whistle and she started running again. As with the game days before, Bianca scored several goals in the scrimmage and got accolades from the other team members, all while you cushioned her sole and licked as much sweat as possible from the bottom of her foot. You would often hear a whistle and hope the scrimmage was over, but instead it would signal Bianca had scored a goal, or she had assisted on one. Finally, after an hour and a half, practice ended. Bianca was tired from the practice, while you were drenched in her footsweat and your body smelled like her feet.
Bianca finished up the practice by talking to the coach and her friends, then went to Cassandra’s car and got in. Bianca took off her cleats and rested for a few minutes before Cassandra said,
“BIANCA, PUT YOUR SHOES BACK ON HONEY, WE DON’T WANT JAKE TO MISS ANY OF THE SMELL.”
“GOOD IDEA MOMMY!” you heard Bianca say before you were stuffed back into her cleats. You recalled what Cassandra said about trying to like Bianca’s feet, so you decided to fake affection and start kissing her foot between licks. You hear her giggle and say,
“OH THAT FEELS NICE JAKEY.”
“JAKEY IS BEING A GOOD SLAVE AND KISSING MY FOOT,” Bianca says to her mother.
“THAT MEANS HE LIKES BEING UNDER YOUR FEET,” Cassandra says back.
Bianca wiggles her toes and smiles as you keep kissing and licking her sole to keep up appearances. After Cassandra gets some fast food, they pull up to the house and Bianca runs inside, taking her cleats and socks off as she gets in the door.
“LEAVE JAKE ON THE TABLE AND GO TAKE A SHOWER,” Cassandra shouts.
Bianca peels you off with her fingers and says,
“I’M GLAD YOU LIKE MY FEET JAKEY, I’LL SEE YOU AGAIN SOON.”
Cassandra then walks up to the table smiling and says,
“I’M GLAD YOU ARE STARTING TO LIKE BIANCA’S FEET. SHE DOES REALLY WELL ON THE SOCCER FIELD WITH YOU UNDERNEATH THEM.”
“Well, they are not as nice as yours, obviously, but they are smooth and nicely formed,” you reply.
“WELL, I’M GLAD IT’S YOU SERVING AS HER INSOLE AND NOT ME, BECAUSE YOU STINK JAKE, BUT I AM HAPPY YOU ARE COMING AROUND,” Cassandra says still smiling.
Before you can reply she knocks you off the table and onto the ground, then stomps you into the ground with her right foot before you can react. You stick to the ball of her foot as she walks to her bedroom and changes, putting you inside her slippers. You lick her sole, as you have been trained, but would do so anyways to try to get the taste of Bianca’s foot out of your mouth. You inhale her scent, but realize that you still smell like Bianca’s feet. You are sure it will take tomorrow’s jog with Cassandra in order to get the scent of her feet back on you. Just then, Bianca comes into the living room, where Cassandra is watching tv and says,
“CAN I HAVE JAKEY FOR SCHOOL TOMORROW? HE FEELS SO GOOD UNDER MY FEET.”
Cassandra thinks for a second, then replies,
“_________________”

12211112111211211212112112111111.content:
“MAYBE IF YOU ARE GOOD YOU CAN HAVE HIM BACK SOON,” Cassandra says to Bianca.
“OK…” Bianca says with a sad face.
“HEY, I JUST HAD AN IDEA FOR A FUN GAME, GO GET TWISTER BIANCA,” Cassandra cheerfully said.
Bianca came back with the Twister box and set the matt up on the floor. Cassandra then lifted her foot out of her slipper and pealed you off using the fingers on her right hand and placed you on the matt.
“OK INSOLE, PICK A DOT TO LAY DOWN ON, FACE UP AND SPREAD EAGLE,” Cassandra commanded.
You did as instructed and found a red dot to lay on.
“WON’T WE NEED SOMEONE TO USE THE SPINNER WHILE WE PLAY?” asked Bianca.
“THAT’S RIGHT, CLAIRE! CAN YOU COME IN HERE?” Cassandra shouted to her sister.
Claire walked in and noticed what was going on.
“CAN YOU HELP US OUT FOR A LITTLE WHILE?” Cassandra asked.
“SURE, BUT I GET TO PLAY THE WINNER OF THIS GAME,” Claire said smiling.
“ALRIGHT, BIANCA YOU CAN GO FIRST,” Cassandra said.
Claire spun the spinner and giggled out loud as she said, “RIGHT FOOT RED.”
“I WANT LICKS AND KISSES AS YOU ARE UNDER MY FOOT JAKEY,” Bianca says as she lifts her foot and slowly lowers it down on top of you.
You see Bianca looking down at you then she issues her command and lifts her foot up in an exaggerated style with her foot very high off the ground, you expect a full blown stomp, but she just lowers her foot slowly. As she brings it down on you, it eclipses her face, and for a moment you can see her face between her toes as she continues to bring down her foot. Finally, her foot lands on you and you find yourself under her arch. Fortunately, her feet don’t smell, as she has just showed, and actually have a hint of soap to them. You do as commanded and start kissing and licking, but you have to lean upwards to do so. You also realize your right arm is free, since you have a bit of room under her arch, so you get an idea. You lift your arm and start to quickly rub your fingers back and forth along her sole in an attempt to tickle her. It works and you hear laughter high above as her foot shifts.
“HEHEHE, JAKEY STOP THAT, THAT TICKLES,” Bianca says.
You decide to continue and she keeps laughing for a few more moments before her foot lifts up. She keeps her toes flat on the ground and shifts her forward lifting the heel of her foot above you. You see her heel above you and she brings down powerfully on your body and says,
“I TOLD YOU JAKEY TO STOP TICKLING MY FOOT, NOW YOU CAN SPEND SOME TIME UNDER MY HEEL.”
“THAT’S MY GIRL,” Cassandra said smiling.
Claire spun for Cassandra and the game continued. You stayed under Bianca’s foot several turns, but noticed that when she had to bend forward, you were upside down under her sole, as she would leave her toes on the red dot. You were again stuck to her sole and apparently she hadn’t noticed, or cared.
“RIGHT FOOT, YELLOW,” Claire said to Bianca.
As Bianca moved her foot, Cassandra noticed you weren’t on the red dot anymore and knew you were still under Bianca’s heel.
“LOOKS LIKE OUR LITTLE INSOLE REALLY WANTED TO STAY UNDER YOUR FOOT,” Cassandra said smiling.
“I’M SO GLAD HE LIKES MY FEET,” Bianca said smiling.
“LEFT HAND YELLOW,” Claire said to Cassandra.
As Cassandra went to move, she fell over, which meant she lost. Bianca then jumped up and down in excitement and you realized that Cassandra lost on purpose to see her daughter happy.
“OK, MY TURN, BUT LET’S TAPE THE INSOLE TO THE MATT, SO HE CAN BE UNDER EVERYONE’S FEET,” Claire said.
Cassandra then went to get some tape as Bianca peeled you off her foot and put you on a blue dot.
Cassandra tore off four pieces and taped your arms and legs to the matt.
“THERE, NOW WE CAN ALL ENJOY HIM UNDER OUR FEET,” Cassandra said looking down at you.
The game started again, and you did not find yourself underneath a foot for several turns. However, it was inevitable that you heard Cassandra say,
“LEFT FOOT BLUE,” to Claire and you saw her foot quickly lift and land on top of you.
You begin licking and kissing immediately. Claire wiggles her toes as you do this and you hear,
“I LIKE THAT HE KISSES NOW, HE’S BECOMING A VERY GOOD INSOLE.”
As you lay under Claire’s sole you noticed the smell, she clearly showered in the mornings like Cassandra and her feet smelled like it. You kept kissing and licking her sole for several turns as you wished that her foot would lift off you. Luckily you heard Cassandra say,
“LEFT FOOT YELLOW,” and Claire’s foot lifted off you and you were left alone for a few turns. However, like clockwork you heard “LEFT FOOT BLUE,” and saw Bianca’s foot come into view. She quickly stepped on you since she was trying to keep her balance to win the game. You spent the remainder of the game under Bianca’s sole, which lasted many more turns.
Bianca won again and smiled down at you beneath her foot saying,
“WE MAKE A GOOD TEAM JAKEY, YOU CUSHIONING MY FOOT AND ME DOING THE HEAVY WORK.” It seemed she was right since she did so well with you underfoot. Cassandra looks at the clock and realizes it’s time for Bianca to go to bed.
“TIME FOR BED BIANCA,” Cassandra states.
Bianca then leaves the room, as Cassandra untapes you from the playing matt, removes the tape from your limbs, and puts you in her right slipper. She folds the matt and puts it into the box, then walks to the shelf, and places it back. You spend the next hour inside her slipper licking and kissing her sole. You realized quickly you weren’t stuck to her sole, and could move around slightly. You used this to your advantage and tried to move up her sole, licking at her foot as you moved. Cassandra enjoyed this saying,
“I LIKE YOU’RE MOVING UP MY FOOT; YOU’RE COVERING MUCH MORE GROUND… SOLE THAT WAY, KEEP IT UP INSOLE.”
You do as instructed and continue slowly up her sole. You quickly realize she is helping you in your journey by slightly lifting her foot, you think she is paying attention as she is doing this, but in reality, she’s doing it without almost any thought. You get to the ball of her foot and Cassandra says, “STOP MOVING NOW, AND SPREAD EAGLE.” You do as instructed and you feel the slipper quickly lift on the ground and come back down as she stomps you under her sole. Cassandra then twists her foot around putting all the pressure under the ball of her foot and lets out a giggle,
“I LOVE STOMPING YOU JAKE.”
Cassandra then walks to her bedroom, removes her slipper, and peels you off using the big toenail on her left foot. She looked down at you smiling and said,
“I THINK YOU DESERVE A REWARD, AND I WANT TO DO SOMETHING A LITTLE DIFFERENT THIS TIME.”
You saw the wood block and quickly hoped on, spread eagle, realizing you were giving up on your plan not to take rewards anymore, but you didn’t care. Cassandra then taped you in place. She then looked to her left at something on her bed, and you saw her holding a green knee high sock.
“I HAD AN IDEA OF HOW TO GET YOU TO LIKE BIANCA’S FEET MORE. I’M GOING TO PUT PART OF THIS SOCK AROUND YOUR HEAD WHILE I GIVE YOU YOUR REWARD, SO YOU WILL HAVE TO SMELL HER SCENT. LET’S JUST CALL IT POSITIVE ASSOCIATION,” Cassandra says down to you smiling.
She then puts the sock on your head where the bottom of Bianca’s toes had been. It had only been a few hours since Bianca practiced, but the smell was still very powerful. “OH, I CAN SMELL THAT STENCH FROM UP HERE,” Cassandra said laughing. She then used her big toe, as per usual, and stimulated you. Your body quickly gave in to the pleasure she was giving you and your member hardened up and your breathing quickened, which intensified the odor. Cassandra felt you were coming close to climax and stopped, removing her toe from your groin. As before you tried to finish yourself off, but you only had Bianca’s sock on your face, so you started sucking on the cotton fabric and breathing deeply, but to no avail. You went soft, and Cassandra started again. You kept sucking on the fabric and breathing deeply until she finished you off, which was not immediate. In order to make the point, she let you go soft and started again about ten times, really trying to force you into liking Bianca’s feet. You had to admit as you laid under Bianca’s damp sock, or at least the part of it that was on your face, exhausted and satisfied, you realized that Bianca’s feet might not be that bad after all. Cassandra untaped you from the block and said,
“WELL, IT LOOKS LIKE YOU ENJOYED THAT, I THINK I’LL LET YOU SLEEP IN BIANCA’S SOCK TONIGHT SINCE YOU SEEM TO LIKE BEING WITH IT.”
Cassandra then put you in the sock and tied it in knot where at the point where the insole of it started, leaving you to spend your night with a still slightly damp, and very smelly sock that Bianca had worn.

122111121112112112121121121111111.content:
As you woke up, the smell of Bianca’s feet were still present. Cassandra had kept you in her sock while she got breakfast and read the paper, allowing you more time to smell Bianca’s sock. Finally, Cassandra came in and untied the sock, dumping you into her shoe.
“DID YOU ENJOY YOUR SLEEP MY INSOLE?” Cassandra said looking down at you inside her shoe.
“Yes, it was quite nice,” you answer, not wanting to annoy her.
“WELL, I HOPE YOU HAVEN’T BECOME TOO ACCUSTOMED TO MY DAUGHTER’S FEET, BECAUSE MY FEET NEED SOME ATTENTION,” Cassandra says as she slides her foot into her shoe, trapping you under her sole.
You see your aunt’s foot coming into the shoe and run to the indentation the ball of her foot made, which after being her insole all these days you are familiar with. You run to it and lay horizontal to her foot as the ball of her foot makes contact with your body and she presses her foot down, flexing and contracting the muscles on top of you until her shoe is comfortably on her foot.
“YOU KNOW INSOLE, THIS IS THE WEEK ANNIVERSARY OF YOU BEING SHRUNK AND UNDER MY FOOT. I THINK IT’S GOING REALLY WELL, YOU’RE SO WELL BEHAVED NOW, YOU EVEN WENT UNDER THE BALL OF MY FOOT AND LAID DOWN FOR ME WITHOUT ANY INSTRUCTION. YOU’RE A GOOD FOOT SLAVE,” Cassandra boomed down to you in her shoe. She gave her toes a wiggle and then tied her shoes as she left for her run.
The familiar process of being stomped and sweated upon by Cassandra’s foot, as you licked and kissed her sole started again. It felt like you had been underneath these women’s feet for longer than a week, but in a way it felt like only a day too. Although your aunts and cousin have basically enslaved you to their feet against your will, you find that’s it not entirely unpleasant. You do enjoy your time under Cassandra’s feet, and after last night, maybe Bianca’s feet won’t be so bad… You catch yourself mid-thought and wonder what is happening to you. You used to be a high school kid with dreams and desires to go to college. Now, you’ve been turned into a footslave and insole by your aunts and cousin and are considering willingly staying under their feet. You are torn, Cassandra makes you really happy, even if she just uses you for her feet, is that enough, you wonder.
You continue your thoughts for the rest of her jog, as her foot pounds you into her sole. All remnants of Bianca’s footsmell on your body have been completely replaced by Cassandra’s as her sweat again seeps into you. Cassandra makes it home in record time, again, completing the ten miles in about an hour. When she walks in the usual routine starts, she takes her shoes off, keeping you stuck under her sole and runs her bath water, then walks around the house doing a few tasks as the tub fills, finally she removes her clothes and you are lifted into the bathtub, as your body remains glued to her sole. Your aunt props her feet up on the edge of the tub as usual. You turn your head and notice her other foot, the polish on the nails seems to be chipping. Cassandra notices too as she peels you off her sole, using her big toe on her left foot,
“IT LOOKS LIKE MY PAINT JOB FROM LAST WEEK IS CHIPPING OFF, IT LOOKS LIKE SOMEONE IS GOING TO HAVE A JOB TO DO AT WORK,” Cassandra said as you retrieved the tools and started cleaning her soles.
While you are cleaning the dirt away from her soles, using the stick and cloth provided, you realize that you’ve gotten stronger. Apparently being used as a human insole for a week has strengthened your body and muscles somehow. You reach the position on her feet, where you can go no further with the stick and cloth and have to ask your aunt to lower her feet so you can finish. With bended knee you shout, “Aunt Cassandra, can you please lower your perfect feet, so that I, your footslave, may continue cleaning them?”
“OK…” Cassandra sighs and lowers her feet.
You finish cleaning them and decide to surprise your aunt. You quickly climb her left foot and position your body underneath her toes, with your head beneath her big toe, and your feet beneath her third toe. As you started to kiss her skin you hear a loud giggle and feel her foot move.
“SOMEONE’S EAGER TO GET UNDER MY FEET AGAIN, BUT WHY DON’T YOU KEEP KISSING FOR A LITTLE WHILE LONGER AND ADD SOME LICKING TOO,” Cassandra says down to you.
You comply and start kissing and licking more passionately and even use your right arm to caress her toe. Cassandra felt the latter and started giggling again and clamped her toes down on you. You continued to kiss the skin, but your body was immobile under the pressure of her toes. Cassandra let out a sigh and enjoyed the feeling of your tiny lips against her toe. She closed her eyes and began to flex and relax the muscles at the top of her foot. For a moment you saw the light and then Cassandra clamped her toes again and you were hugged by her skin again. This had the effect of spinning you and now you were kissing and licking the pad of her big toe. Cassandra held this position for a few moments before repeating the action and spun you so that you were now kissing the area where the toe connects to the foot.
“WHILE I’D LOVE TO SIT IN THE TUB HERE ALL DAY AND HAVE YOU BENEATH MY TOES KISSING AND LICKING THEM, SADLY, ONE OF US HAS TO DO SOME WORK AROUND HERE,” Cassandra says as she lifts herself out of the tub and steps on the bathmat. She drops you and quickly stomps you under the ball of her foot adhering you to her sole, like so many days before. As with other days, you are walked on as your aunt dresses for work and you are placed, along with her beautiful feet, inside a pair of pantyhose, and then in her high heels. This had all become routine and you had already been kissing her the sole of her foot for fifteen minutes before she walked out to the car for her daily drive to the office. As you were under her left foot, you got a break from the stomping of her foot on the accelerator and brakes.

"Thanks mom!" Said Bianca happily. "I can't wait to feel my cousin under my sole again!"
"And I bet he can't wait to stay under your feet too, right, my foot grime?" Said Cassandra flexing her feet. You give a big kiss in reply, but you are not so hopeful for that. When the morning comes, you are still sleeping, but you are awakened by Bianca's booming steps and noises. After a few minutes everything moves around and suddenly, Bianca's big eyes are looking at you.

"Hi Bianca" You said timidly.

"Awww you are so cute Jakey... Well, if you are missing my smelling feet, you will be happy right now, because here comes!"
She shifted her shoe and quickly her happy face was replaced by her giant feet. She wiggle her toes in anticipation and slide her feet as you feel it passing over your body.

Obeying Bianca, you crawl to the arch and adjusted your self under her smelly toes. The air begin to get warm and then, your giant cousin put her whole feet, lacing the shoe with you trapped inside. You start to lick and kiss her toes as she walks, squeezing you. Sometimes she squeezes you so strong that you can't do anything.
"Mommy trained you so well Jakey. Well, keep licking and kissing as you enjoys the smell. You fell so good under my feet, little cousin."
The smell are terrible and you wish to stay with your aunt, but you can't disobey any order of these giantess. Like a good pet, you stay licking and kissing Bianca's toes as your lungs are full of her feet smell. The time are passing and...

1221111211121121122.content:
As you (I’m changing Jake back to you now, which is how I should have originally done the chapters for this story) decide, it seems worth the risk going back to Bianca. The footfalls of Cassandra on you as she runs are more than you want to deal with and it’s only a matter of time before Claire walks all over you. While their soles are soft, their feet are larger than Bianca’s and much more powerful. You begin to realize that your body could stick almost entirely underneath some of their larger toes, that’s just how small you are. The amount of foot sweat under Bianca’s feet would probably be less than that of Cassandra or Claire, which is also a plus. Finally, Bianca provides the best hope of escape since she would likely be the most careless, case in point how you ended up under Cassandra’s feet, which will give you a chance to get attention from someone who might wish to help, rather than leave you underfoot as an insole.

With your mind made up, you navigate up the covers of your sleeping aunt and get near the head of the bed. You use the covers to shimmie down to the ground and walk along the carpet, which takes awhile at your size. until you get to the door and slide under. You make your way through the hallway to Bianca’s room, which fortunately for you is close by. You then start to think about hiding in the house somewhere, but then you realize that all three women know you’re tiny and all of them seem to like having you underfoot, so you’d eventually be back under one of their feet again. You push on to Bianca’s room and climb up her bed using her bed sheets. All this climbing makes you think about taking up rock climbing when you get back to normal.

You decide that you have to act like you want to be under Bianca’s feet, so she won’t think you ran away and punish you by sticking you someplace bad. So, you run under her covers and try to find where her feet are at in the dark. You get to her feet, but realize she is wearing socks. “Who wears socks to bed?” You think to yourself. You realize the only way to show her you didn’t run off is to climb in her socks and play the role of the willing footslave. You realize at least it’s better than going somewhere else on her body, as you shutter at the thought…

So you pull back the lip of the sock and climb under her foot using the sock as a grip. You get under her foot and realize that the arch is probably the place you’ll take the least amount of weight if she steps on you. So you use the grip on her sock to jump into her arch and try to grab on. However, since her socks were not on tight enough to hold you in place, and she had her feet placed upright so her toes were the highest point and her heel the lowest, you slid all the way down her smooth sole, collecting her sweat on your body along the way, and landed at the bottom of her heel. You then thought that you could stay under her toes, since you did that with Cassandra and there wasn’t much weight on you. So, you make another attempt, and when you get to the top of her sock, you maneuver yourself so that you’re now lengthwise underneath her toes. At this point you notice the smell, and decide maybe this wasn’t better than Cassandra or Claire’s feet, but Bianca might be the best opportunity for escape, since she may take her shoes off at school allowing you an opportunity to get help.

At this point you start licking in between her first and second toes in an attempt to get her attention. You then hear a child-like giggle and she wiggles her toes back and forth, so you stop licking assuming she’s about to take her sock off and find you, but no luck. She then repositions herself and turns her foot sideways, and you’re holding onto her second toe for dear life. As her foot settles, you wait a few seconds, and then lick again. This time, her toes clamp down all around you and you can feel her foot moving your entire body. Since her toes were smaller than either of your aunt’s they left you less room, although it was not entirely uncomfortable, it felt like a soft hug from all sides, albeit a very smelly hug. Bianca sat up on her bed and turned on her lamp on her nightstand. She then positioned her right foot on her left knee and peeled off her sock to see what had been causing her all this trouble. As she stopped flexing her toes, a large smile formed on her face,
“JAKE, THERE YOU ARE! I’VE BEEN LOOKING FOR YOU SINCE I GOT HOME FROM SCHOOL, WHERE HAVE YOU BEEN?” Bianca asked, trying to keep her voice down.
“Cassandra found me in her shoe and kept me under her foot all day, then gave me to Claire to rub her feet all night, but when she fell asleep, I decided to escape from them and come back to my rightful place under your feet,” you say, trying to make her think you want to be under her feet. You continue, “That’s why I was in your sock licking your toes, I thought they might be a little sweaty and I wanted to make sure to get it off for you.”
Bianca seems to buy this and says “AWW, THAT’S SO CUTE JAKEY, I GUESS I’LL HAVE TO KEEP YOU UNDER MY FEET FOREVER NOW, SINCE I CAN’T LET MY MOM OR AUNT CLAIRE FIND YOU…”
“WELL, IT’S STILL PRETTY EARLY, I’M GOING TO TAKE OFF MY SOCKS AND LET YOU SPEND THE REST OF THE MORNING UNTIL I WAKE UP AGAIN LICKING MY FEET, BECAUSE THAT FELT REALLY GOOD,” Bianca says placing you back under the sheets and putting her feet in front of you. You start to lick and hear her giggle again and hope you made the right choice, because being found by either of your two aunts now would be bad news.

Cassandra forgot that Christmas was coming first and She wanted to give her daughter her present as soon as possible so she wrapped you up in Christmas paper and put you under the tree on Christmas Eve where you waited 8 hours before Bianca woke up and started to rush and open up all her Christmas presents.

This year you were to become the pet to a young giant girl and you're not sure if she will ever let you go?
